title: Weekly Bonus Event: Warlords of Draenor Timewalking
body: Travel back in time to the Warlords of Draenor dungeons in this week’s Bonus Event.

title: WoW® Classic City Tour: Ironforge
body: Finding trainers and supplies can take a little extra time to adjust to in WoW® Classic, but we’ve got a handy guide to help you get around the dwarf capital city of Ironforge.

title: The Next Battle for Azeroth Content Update is Now Live!
body: The next World of Warcraft®: Battle for Azeroth content update is now live. Learn what’s ahead.

title: Hotfixes: September 20, 2019
body: ​Here you'll find a list of hotfixes that address various issues related to World of Warcraft: Battle For Azeroth.

title: WoW® Classic City Tour: Orgrimmar
body: Finding trainers and supplies can take a little extra time to adjust to in WoW® Classic, but we’ve got a handy guide to help you get around the Horde capital city of Orgrimmar.

title: Brewfest Kegs Are Tapped and Festivities are in Full Swing! September 20–October 6
body: Get ready to crack open a cold one with friends new and old during our revamped Brewfest!

title: AWC Summer Finals: Last Chance for BlizzCon 2019
body: The four very best teams from North America and Europe battle for the last two remaining spots for the AWC Global Finals at BlizzCon.

title: WoW® Classic: Getting around Azeroth
body: There are various modes of mass transit available to those looking to get around Azeroth. Learn more about each of these and where they are in our latest look into WoW® Classic.

title: Stormsong Valley’s Newest Hive is the Bee’s Knees
body: Discover what beekeepers are abuzz about in Stormsong Valley.

title: Jump Aboard the Pirate’s Day Celebration– September 19!
body: Avast ye landlubbers! It’s time to hoist sail and make way to Booty Bay for Pirate’s Day!

title: PvP Brawls Schedule 2019
body: Experience some of your favorite player-vs-player Battlegrounds with a twist during PvP Brawls! Read on to learn more.

title: Own a Piece of World of Warcraft History and Help Support Pencils of Promise *Sold Out!
body: Commemorate 15 years of epic adventures in Azeroth by owning a piece of World of Warcraft history—and feel good doing it. We’ve preserved a number of retired HP server blades that once hosted many World of Warcraft realms, and you can purchase one Tuesday, September 10 at 2:00 p.m. PDT and Thursday, September 12 at 7:00 a.m. PDT on the Blizzard Gear Store Europe.

title: 8.2.5 Content Update Notes
body: The official update notes for the new content update are here.

title: WoW® Classic City Tour: Stormwind
body: Navigating the capital cities in of Azeroth is a different affair in WoW Classic. Finding the trainers and supplies you need can take a little extra time to adjust to, so we’ve put together a handy guide to point you in the right direction.

title: Party Sync Preview
body: The new Party Sync feature makes it easier than ever for friends to party up and quest together.

title: These Million Gold Looks for Goblins and Worgen are Something to Howl About
body: Get ready to shapeshift your look with new worgen and goblin models and animations—coming in the 8.2.5 content update.

title: Recruit A Friend Returns Soon!
body: Bring your friends to Azeroth and earn special rewards.

title: Weekly Bonus Event: Mists of Pandaria Timewalking
body: Travel back in time to the Mists of Pandaria dungeons in this week’s Bonus Event.

title: Trial of Style August 31– September 4: The Stage Is Yours
body: Styles from Kul Tiras and Zandalar are all the rage, but is your transmog the flavor of the moment? Or is it a timeless couture classic? You’ll be able to find out during the Trial of Style, taking place August 31 –September 4! Prepare to strut your stuff in a head-to-head fashion face-off and see who can put it all together—for the win!

title: World of Warcraft Classic Is Now Live!
body: The floodgates are now open, and WoW Classic is live!

title: Kickoff to WoW® Classic with HyperX—Watch the VoD
body: Kick off the launch of WoW Classic with HyperX in a live stream featuring interviews, discussions, and more.

title: WoW Classic Name Reservations Now Open! *Update 30/8
body: Take your first step toward preparing for WoW Classic by reserving your name before the game goes live in Europe on August 27 at 00:01 CEST!

title: World of Warcraft Classic Community Resources
body: World of Warcraft Classic provides players the opportunity to delve into a faithful recreation of the original WoW experience, but no one has to go it alone. We’ve gathered together some of the best resources from around the community to help.

title: Watch Now! WoW Classic with Creators
body: Take a stroll down memory lane with some of the original World of Warcraft designers in our new video.

title: Weekly Bonus Event: Battle for Azeroth Dungeons
body: This week’s Bonus Event is underway, and we’re setting our sights on Battle for Azeroth Dungeons.

title: World of Warcraft Classic FAQ: What You Need to Know
body: World of Warcraft Classic launches August 27. To make sure you’re prepared, we’ve pulled together some information to help you get started on your journey through Azeroth.

title: Micro-Holidays: 2019 Calendar
body: Micro-holidays provide a variety of in-game experiences simply for the fun of taking part in them. Read on to learn about more.

title: The Eternal Palace Raid: Raid Finder Wing 3 Now Available!
body: Face Queen Azshara’s most devoted champions in an epic new raid—The Eternal Palace.

title: Viewer’s Guide: Mythic Dungeon International Summer Season
body: Dungeon Racing is back with the Summer Season of the MDI!

title: WoW Classic Primer for New Players
body: If you’ve never played the original World of Warcraft (or you just want a refresher on the WoW Classic experience, we’ve got you covered with this handy guide on how to get in and get going on your epic adventure.

title: Commemorate 15 Years of World of Warcraft With New Alabaster Mounts!
body: Take to the skies of Azeroth in grand style with a pair of majestic alabaster mounts—now available on the Blizzard Shop.

title: Wrath of the Lich King Timewalking Returns — July 16-23
body: This week’s Bonus Event is underway and we’re headed to Northrend to do some Timewalking. Are you ready to step into Ulduar? Read on to learn more.

title: The Eternal Palace Race to World First Begins This Week!
body: The race to see who can be the first to defeat Azshara in her Eternal Palace begins this week and we’ve got the scoop on where you can watch all the action live!

title: Battle for Azeroth Mythic Keystone Dungeon and PvP Season 3 Has Begun!
body: Battle for Azeroth Season 3 opens up new challenges with the opening of Mythic Operation: Mechagon, a new affix in Mythic Keystone Dungeons, and more PvP action.

title: Rise of Azshara Content Update Notes: Season 3
body: The official update notes for the July 10, 2019 content update to Rise of Azshara are here.
